display_long_description:
Skiing Dash VR delivers an exciting, high-speed skiing adventure built for Meta Quest. Instead of relying on thumbsticks, you push with ski poles to accelerate, giving you full control and a realistic downhill feel.

Dive into the rush of pure speed, dodge obstacles, enjoy the beautiful falling snow, and explore multiple handcrafted maps. On every run, race against the clock to grab as many gifts as possible and achieve the highest score.

Designed for players who love fast, energetic gameplay, Skiing Dash VR offers a refreshing mix of motion-based control, winter atmosphere, and adrenaline-pumping action.

Key Features

Ski-pole based movement — push to accelerate, just like real skiing.

Strong sense of speed and smooth motion designed for comfort.

Immersive falling snow and winter environments.

Multiple unique maps to explore.

Collect gifts within the time limit to win.

Quick, fun, replayable gameplay loops.

Feel the wind, master your speed, and dash your way down the mountain in Skiing Dash VR.

Update
This update focuses on fixing known bugs, improving overall performance, and enhancing game stability.
